attributes.action: Refer Ebay / PayPal to Competition Commission
attributes.additional_details: Ebay insists that sellers offer PayPal as a payment method.  No other form of electronic payment is allowed.  Adverts that state 'I do not accept PayPal' are refused.  Ebay own PayPal.  This surely is a  Monopoly which should be investigated by the  Competition Commision or The Office of Fair Trading.
